Ian Fleming's James Bond 007 in Live and Let Die: The Computer Game
name: Aquablast
overview: You are James Bond 007 and you must stop Mr. Big from delivering heroin for free. You control a boat that can destroy enemy boats and can go up to 100 MPH. You must dodge or destroy enemy boats and must dodge defensive gun fire.
